name: Haus Grünbergblick
description: Experience relaxing summer or winter holidays in the Gästehaus Grünbergblick, in southern Mayrhofen in a sunny position, only a few minutes from the town centre and the lifts. Close to the house is the ski bus stop and cross country ski trail. Our house is the ideal starting point for many beautiful walks into the Zillertaler mountain world. Or just relax in our summer house and sunbathe in the garden.
The price excludes a final cleaning charge of between 25.- and 30.- Euro.

Arrival and departure available any time.
At Mayrhofen drive past the railway station, first turning on the left - Einfahert Mitte - past the post office, first right and up the high street and over the bridge, right and follow the road. Haus Grünerblick can be found on the right.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: Pleasantly furnished holiday apartment, approx. 45m², fully furnished, with 2 separate bedrooms, one with a double bed and the other with 2 single beds, shower/WC. Large lounge/kitchen fully equipped with electric oven, coffee machine, cable TV, wall safe and large balcony. Bed linen, hand/bath towels and tea towels are supplied.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: Pleasantly furnished holiday apartment, approx. 45m², fully furnished, 1 double bedroom, shower/WC. Lounge/kitchen fully equipped with electric oven, coffee machine, dish washer,cable TV, wall safe and balcony. Bed linen, hand/bath and tea towels are supplied.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 1 bed room
makesOffer.description: Pleasantly furnished holiday apartment, approx. 50m², fully furnished with a double bedroom, shower/WC and balcony. Lounge with a double sofa bed, cable TV, wall safe, dining area. Fully equipped kitchen area with electric oven, dish washer, coffee machine and micro wave. Large hall with cloakroom. Bed linen, hand and bath towels as well as tea towels are supplied.
